title: Analytics Dashboard
summary: Realtime charts, role-based access, and integrations.

body.raw:
## Overview
I built a performant dashboard with realtime metrics, row-level security, and a modular widget system.

- Server components for data-heavy views
- Streaming and Suspense for fast TTFB
- Framer Motion for micro-interactions

## Outcomes
- 1.7s â†’ 0.9s LCP
- 30% time-on-page increase

title: Focus Chrome Extention
summary: A chrome extention, which blocks websites

body.raw:
## Overview
I built a chrome extention, which blocks every website except the ones you whitelist. It has also a nice screen like momentum, where you can completely focus on your tasks

- block every website
- whitelist websites
- clean and modern starting screen
- challenges you have to do in order to unlock websites for a few minutes

## Outcomes
- nice chrome extention

title: IWS Landing Page
summary: Landing page for a small business owner with the help of lovable.dev

body.raw:
## Overview
I built a nice landing page for a small business owner


## Outcomes
- Nice Landing page
